name: missing piece ($@LTWICK)
description:
a quick? demo-ish thingy where you're chased by a yandere. it's not at all done but there's enough to play ig???

you are able to die (lol??) and there is a kill? sort of animation with gore. otherwise this part of the game is very tame. some breaking and entering yk the usual.

my main point for showing the game off now is sort of for proof of concept? i made in for the valentine game jam but it won't be finished in time.

our lovely yandere is yumemi

art, story, coding, font = yours truely, $@LTWICK

music by = green_bear_music

sound effects by = zapsplat
